name: Spicy and Salty Mango Lassi
description: This smoothie is a mash-up of a lassi, the Indian yogurt drink, and the spicy mangoes sold by street vendors.
recipeIngredient: Flesh of 2 Ataulfo mangoes (about 1 1/4 cup), cubed
2 generous dashes of cayenne pepper, or more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend on high until smooth, about 30 seconds. Taste and add more cayenne pepper if desired. Pour into two glasses and serve immediately.
